The image was published on Facebook on A: 2020, with a caption that translates to English as a criticism of Narendra Modi bowing in front of Nehru.
A reverse image search on Google reveale: The original photo showed Modi bowing to a statue of Mahatma Gandhi and was published on Modi's official Twitter account.
The photo of the Nehru statue used in th: a stock photography agency. The statue is located in the city of Barshi in Maharashtra.
